summary: I HAD A ENGINE SEIZE UP AFTER 22,000 MILES BECAUSE OF ENGINE SLUDGE. I HAVE HAD AT LEAST 4 OILL CHANGES ON THE VEHICLE ABOUT EVERY 5,000 MILES . MANUFACTURER RECOMMENDED STATES THAT MAXIMUN IS 75000 MILES. I HAVE A 3 YEAR OLD CAR WITH 22,000 MILES ON IT AND A SEIZED ENGINE. CAN YOU HELP????*AK
